_description: Turborepo Configuration - Build orchestration for monorepo. Defines pipeline tasks (build, test, lint, dev) with dependency ordering and caching. Tasks: build (depends on ^build), test (depends on build), lint (no deps), dev (cache: false, persistent: true). Global environment variables: BLOCKCHAIN_RPC_URL, PINATA_API_KEY. Outputs: dist/**, build/**, .next/**. Remote caching: Vercel Remote Cache (optional)
